title: Project-Based Strengthening of Problem-Finding Competencies for Creative Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and general understanding of elementary education settings
context.additional_context: Students Experience Identifying and Analyzing Problems in Real Elementary Education Scenarios, with a Collaborative Environment Enabling Data Collection via Personal Devices

learning_goals: Learners can identify potential problem elements in diverse elementary education contexts using at least three cognitive strategies (resource management, expansion, analysis, restructuring)
Learners can organize team-based project problems into structured frameworks and propose at least two creative solution directions
Learners can validate the validity of problem discovery processes through peer evaluation and create improvement plans incorporating feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
